attributes.action: No Human Rights for people who commit the worst crimes
attributes.additional_details:
I'm sick of hearing of people who commit the worst crimes (murder, rape, etc.) being entitled to things which they don't deserve because it's their human rights.

An example: Abu Qatada, closely related to terrorism and won't be deported from UK because it's against his human rights. This is pathetic

It's time to think of the victims (or would be) instead of the criminals!
